casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles David BECTON. No. 426P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of August 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
